info.name: EXO Kai
info.additionalInfo:
This is my first dashboard theme, I hope you like it (:
It's actually 1440×810, but my screen is 1366×768 so what you see in the picture is how it looks with my screen resolution.
For those who like it, there's also a black and white version of this dashboard theme~


tumblr: taeline.tumblr.com
